short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to verify emails still exist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time sending emails to an out-of-date address.
Live Data for Gmail automatically checks the address for any business email you send and alerts you if the contact has changed companies.

A Tool for Those on the Frontline:
The B2B world communicates via email – it’s where deals get done and revenue is generated.

Never waste time and effort chasing your most valuable contacts at the wrong address and be the first to know if they have changed companies.

Contact Verification:
We check to see if the email you’re reaching out to is accurate and up-to-date so that you don’t waste time and effort chasing bad contacts.

Old email addresses are flagged and contact job changes are shown for people that have moved on.

Real-time Job Change Data:
We track job changes in real-time to help GTM teams “reach the right people in the right place at the right time”.

Work with the most up-to-date B2B contact info to fuel better outreach and drive results.

Boosting Efficiency for GTM Teams:
Live Data is used by salespeople, marketers, and customer success teams to generate pipeline, close deals, and deliver incredible experiences.

Download Now!

The Live Data for Gmail extension requires an account that you can create immediately after installation via Google. You'll get 1,000 free checks/month and can upgrade your account for more.

By installing the extension, you agree to Live Data's Privacy Policy (https://www.livedatatechnologies.com/privacy-policy). 

For questions reach out to info@livedatatechnologies.com!
